response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that holds immense worth for me. Considering its exceptional qualities and the effort put into it, I am offering this product to you at a special price of $750,000. This is a chance to own something truly remarkable at a price that reflects its intrinsic value while offering you a significant discount. I trust that you will appreciate the significance of this offer and consider it carefully. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
